channel.title: Making A Bigger Resolution Screen? Simple Yes Or NO!
channel.description:
Hello everyone, i am curious if it is possible to make the gameplay screen bigger or even remove the frames like "Inventory" "NE Corner Map."
Sincerely thanks to all that help..

item.title: Making A Bigger Resolution Screen? Simple Yes Or NO!
item.dc:creator: @Project_Zlap Project Zlap
item.description:
@Project_Zlap wrote:

So its suggested i just leave full screen in my dreams, and stick to a tad bit bigger screen, but not enough to ruin the quality???

Read full topic
item.source: Making A Bigger Resolution Screen? Simple Yes Or NO!

item.title: Making A Bigger Resolution Screen? Simple Yes Or NO!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:5, topic:285885”][quote author=Project Zlap link=topic=378089.msg2844728#msg2844728 date=1246207803]
I am thinking of a full screen client, will that in anyway run down the quality of the client? BTW thanks.
[/quote]

You can make any client FullScreen, but yes, if you did it with 317 - shitty 317 graphics, if you did with 508 - shitty 508 graphics, just bigger.[/quote]
Why not just say its overall crappy graphics?

ONTOPIC - Yes it is possible. If you are good enough with clients you can bring out the zoom of the camera and make it look better during full-screen game-play. That also helps with those “shitty” graphic looks. (mainly because it makes them smaller)

Read full topic
item.source: Making A Bigger Resolution Screen? Simple Yes Or NO!

I am thinking of a full screen client, will that in anyway run down the quality of the client? BTW thanks.

You can make any client FullScreen, but yes, if you did it with 317 - shitty 317 graphics, if you did with 508 - shitty 508 graphics, just bigger.

item.title: Making A Bigger Resolution Screen? Simple Yes Or NO!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

pzykow:

YES

Well, do you have anything else to say then YES, or are you just going to spam your way up to senior member?

Also, do you want to make your client full screen? Or just bigger? Because there are ways to doing that, if you look on rune-server downloads the’ve got a few full screen 317 clients.

Thanks
~Johno

Read full topic
